title: Disco Wednesdayyy - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Mature   Mystery   Psychological   Sci-fi   Supernatural
tags: An*l   Age Progression   Age Regression   Aggressive Characters   Character Growth   Clever Protagonist   Depression   Destiny   Detectives   Male Protagonist   Multiple Identities   Mystery Solving   Orphans   Time Travel
author: Otaro Maijo   舞城 王太郎
description: Disco Wednesdayyy, an American detective specializing in missing children, lives with six-year old Kozue Yamagishi in Chofu City, Tokyo. One day, a seventeen-year-old girl 'invades' Kozue's body right before his eyes, and with it, the door to the biggest case in human history opens. A soul thief, a black bird man who embodies all evil, and a series of deaths of great detectives gathered in a strange cylindrical house—— 'You are at the center of this disaster.' Just Facts! Chasing only the truth, run through three thousand worlds, Disco!>
